name: Pandemic Hospital
description:
No room. Understaffed. Underfunded. Overwhelmed. Regardless of that, you try your best to help out the sick people coming into the hospital.

True Gamers  | AJ Sall, Tom Devaney, and Cali Devaney

Made for the Epic Game Jam 2021 in 7 short yet long days, where the theme was "Running Out of Space".
